languages.text: "У вас определенно {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}наметан глаз{/d} на насущные вопросы. Леди Теодора уверила меня, что на Летусе есть некая уникальная система автоматизации барж. У нас нет выбора, кроме как проверить ее слова на практике".

"You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."
languages.original_text: "У вас определенно {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}наметан глаз{/d} на насущные вопросы. Леди Теодора уверила меня, что на Летусе есть некая уникальная система автоматизации барж. У нас нет выбора, кроме как проверить ее слова на практике".

"You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of a unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

"You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

languages.text: “看得出来，你在解决实际问题方面{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}很有经验{/d}。西奥多拉夫人曾向我保证过，说利瑟斯配备了某种独一无二的自动装货系统。如今我们别无选择，只能看看她的话是不是真的。”
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: “看得出来，你在解决实际问题方面{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}很有经验{/d}。西奥多拉夫人曾向我保证过，说利瑟斯配备了某种独一无二的自动装货系统。如今我们别无选择，只能看看她的话是不是真的。”

languages.text: 「あなたは明らかに実用的な問題に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}目を向けています{/d}。レディ・シオドーラは、リーザスには荷船の自動化のための独特なシステムがあると私に保証してくれました。今は、彼女の言葉を信じるしかありません」
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは明らかに実用的な問題に{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}目を向けています{/d}。レディ・シオドーラは、リーザスには荷船の自動化のための独特なシステムがあると私に保証してくれました。今は、彼女の言葉を信じるしかありません」

languages.text: «Es evidente que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}tiene buen ojo{/d} para los asuntos de logística. Lady Theodora me aseguró que Leethus tenía un sistema único de automatización de transporte. No tenemos más opción que ponerlo a prueba».
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: «Es evidente que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}tiene buen ojo{/d} para los asuntos de logística. Lady Theodora me aseguró que Leethus tenía un sistema único de automatización de transporte. No tenemos más opción que ponerlo a prueba».

languages.text: "Ihr habt offenkundig {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ein Händchen{/d} für praktische Lösungen. Lady Theodora hat mir versichert, dass Leethus über irgendein einzigartiges System zur Lastschiffautomatisierung verfügt. Wir haben keine andere Wahl, als ihre Worte auf die Probe zu stellen."
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt offenkundig {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}ein Händchen{/d} für praktische Lösungen. Lady Theodora hat mir versichert, dass Leethus über irgendein einzigartiges System zur Lastschiffautomatisierung verfügt. Wir haben keine andere Wahl, als ihre Worte auf die Probe zu stellen."

languages.text: "Pratik meseleler konusunda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}keskin bir gözünüz olduğu{/d} ortada. Leydi Theodora, Leethus'ın mavna otomasyonu için kendine özgü bir sistem geliştirdiğinden bahsederken gayet kendinden emindi. Bu sözlerin gerçekliğini sınamaktan başka çaremiz yok."
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: "Pratik meseleler konusunda {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}keskin bir gözünüz olduğu{/d} ortada. Leydi Theodora, Leethus'un mavna otomasyonu için kendine özgü bir sistem geliştirdiğinden bahsederken gayet kendinden emindi. Bu sözlerin gerçekliğini sınamaktan başka çaremiz yok.

languages.text: « De toute évidence, vous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}avez l'œil{/d} pour les détails pratiques. D'après dame Théodora, Leethus disposerait d'un système d'automatisation des barges unique en son genre. L'heure est venue pour nous de vérifier ses dires. »
languages.original_text: "You clearly {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}have an eye{/d} for practical issues. Lady Theodora assured me that Leethus had some kind of unique system for barge automation. We have no choice but to put her words to the test."

traits.locale_text: « De toute évidence, vous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}avez l'œil{/d} pour les détails pratiques. D'après dame Théodora, Leethus disposerait d'un système d'automatisation des barges unique en son genre. L'heure est venue pour nous de vérifier ses dires. »
